name: Imagine: Salon Stylist
overview: Express your creativity as a famous hair stylist managing your very own beauty salon! As a successful stylist, select hairstyles, color, and accessories for your clients! Features • Run your own Beauty Salon – Develop your clientele and reputation as you make your customers beautiful in your own salon. • Creative Styling Tools – Unleash your creativity in over a dozen beauty workshops including hair coloring, hairstyling and accessories, and makeup application. • Build Client Relations – Create customer files for each client and learn their beauty preferences. Satisfy them at every visit and they will come back to you. • Design your Salon – Customize your salon so that it matches your style. Unlock new furniture and color palettes or purchase them with the money you’ve earned.
